name: ThreadBright
overview:
ThreadBright is a daily fashion aggregator for top indie, bohemian and vintage shops.

What’s ThreadBright?

ThreadBright is a daily style site that brings together every new arrival from top indie shops into one place. It’s updated every single day, so you’re ensured the latest and freshest styles from the best fashion sites across the web.

What makes it so special?

ThreadBright is a one-stop shop for the busy girl. The site makes online shopping much more convenient. It’s a great way for people to get introduced to new brands. Shoppers can discern all the latest trends without having to navigate any further.

What type of styles does it feature?

ThreadBright showcases the latest and greatest buys. It includes popular shops such as Free People, Nasty Gal and Lulus.

How do I use it?

Just go to ThreadBright.com on your desktop or mobile phone. You will be able to browse through all the newest styles from top indie and vintage shops.

Where did ThreadBright come from?

ThreadBright was founded in San Francisco in December 2012 by people passionate about fashion and technology.
